long_description: Working harder than your average cotton briefs, the Patagonia Lightweight Boxer Briefs enhance comfort no matter the activity. Quick-drying, partially recycled polyester fabric offers easy care, light stretch and superior moisture transfer. Gladiodor(R) natural odor control employs benign amino acids to help keep funky scents at bay; plus, it's nonpolluting, safe and durable. Elastic waistband and coverstitch hem slide easily under layers and enhance mobility. Supportive front panel features a functional fly. The Patagonia Lightweight Boxer Briefs are formfitting.
short_description: Working harder than your average cotton briefs, the Patagonia Lightweight Boxer Briefs enhance comfort no matter the activity.
